subject: The storm

paragraph: The weather had been worsening throughout the week. People were advised to stay indoors. The storm destroyed a historical monument in the old part of the city. Emergency services were quickly on the scene assessing the damage. The cleanup efforts began the following day.

subject: The government
sentence: The government executed several prisoners at dawn today.
paragraph: The court had passed its final judgment last month. Family members and activists gathered outside the prison. The government executed several prisoners at dawn today. subject: The city council

paragraph: Plans for the new community center had been approved. Residents were informed in advance about the upcoming changes. The city council demolished the old school building. subject: The pest control company

subject: The army

subject: The hurricane
sentence: The hurricane obliterated the small coastal town.
paragraph: Warnings were issued days in advance for evacuation. Residents boarded up their homes and sought shelter inland. The hurricane obliterated the small coastal town. Relief efforts began as soon as the storm subsided. Aid and supplies were delivered to those in need.

subject: Scientists

paragraph: Environmentalists raised concerns about the declining local flora. Research teams were dispatched to study the issue. Scientists eradicated the invasive species from the ecosystem. Restoration projects commenced to revive native plants. Success was measured over the following years.

subject: The boxer

subject: The bomb

paragraph: The region had been a flashpoint of tension for months. Military forces increased their presence due to rising threats. The bomb obliterated the entire village. International condemnation followed swiftly. Peace talks were called to de-escalate the situation.

subject: The news of the earthquake

paragraph: Tremors were felt before dawn, waking up residents abruptly. Buildings crumbled as the quake intensified. The news of the earthquake devastated the survivors. Rescue operations started immediately amidst the debris. Global aid poured in to help rebuild the community.

subject: The farmers

paragraph: Alerts were issued about an incoming locust swarm. Farmers prepared measures to protect their fields. The farmers exterminated the locusts destroying their crops. It was a concerted effort that prevented massive loss. Gratitude was expressed for the collaborative assistance.

subject: The explosion

subject: The disease
object: the population of the small island
sentence: The disease annihilated the population of the small island.

subject: The coalition forces
sentence: The coalition forces eradicated the terrorist cell.
paragraph: Intelligence reports indicated suspicious activities. A strategic plan was developed to address the threat. The coalition forces eradicated the terrorist cell. Increased security measures were implemented thereafter. Peace and stability returned to the region.
